data.title: Frequently Asked Questions
data.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the product.

items.title: What is the return policy?
items.content: You can return any item within 30 days of purchase.

items.title: Do you ship internationally?
items.content: Yes, we ship to over 50 countries worldwide.

items.title: How can I contact support?
items.content: You can reach us via email at support@example.com or call us at 1-800-555-0199.
